origin.identity-origins.lycanthrope.name: Werewolf
origin.identity-origins.lycanthrope.desc: Technically a lycanthrope, but Werewolf is the common name.
origin.identity-origins.leporid.name: Leporid
power.identity-origins.wolf_form.name: Transform: Wolf
power.identity-origins.wolf_form.descrip: Use the primary action key to turn into a wolf. While in wolf form, you are treated identically to a regular wolf
power.identity-origins.jumpy.name: Agile
power.identity-origins.jumpy.description: You jump a bit higher and run a bit faster.
power.identity-origins.wolf_descriptor.d: While in wolf form, you are immune to the negative effects of Puffer fish, Raw Chicken and Rotten Flesh
power.identity-origins.adrenalin.name: Adrebakub
